results.title: [Optimization of pharmacotherapy in patients with essential hypertension with neurohumoral modulators with consideration of data on heart rate variability].
results.text_hl: Long-term treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@EH@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Autonomic_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001342 @@@autonomic dysfunction@@@ (sympathicotonia type) with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in combination with @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ augmented activity of humoral systems and improved heart rate variability.

citations.NLM: Kakhramanova SM, Bakhshaliev AB. [Optimization of pharmacotherapy in patients with essential hypertension with neurohumoral modulators with consideration of data on heart rate variability]. Kardiologiia. 2013;53(12):25-32. PMID: 24800478
